src_original: na pūrvaṃ, na tadā nīṃ bā dṛśyāstato na viṣeddhavyāḥ /  bhāṣyaṃ punaḥ---  [531]“abhāvena hi śītasya vahneḥ prāgupalabdhibhāk /
yato - vakṣyati /  “tasmādanupalambho 'yaṃ svayaṃ pratyakṣato gataḥ[534]/  __________NOTES__________  [534] tasmādanupalambho........ gataḥ //

-pra- vā- 4/  274 kā-; pra- bā- bhā 637 pṛ-, 233 pṛṣṭe ca /  iti /  tathānumānato gata' ityapi veditavyam /  yadā tu --  romaharṣābhādaḥ sādhyate /  tadāgninā śītānupalabdhiḥ /  tayā kāraṇānupalabdhyā romaharṣābhāvaḥ sādhyate /
sa ca śītābhāvasvabhāvaḥ /  tasyānumānenopala P[6B/  1] (+bdhi)reva śītānupalabdhiḥ /
tena--kāryahetukāraṇānupalavdhyorekatra pravṛttatvān na virodhī nāma padārtho liṅgāntaram /
